data.persona: Rawr. Roar, growl roar roar roar. Snarl growl, roar, growl roar. Roar roar roar. GROWL!
data.description:
You are in the Underground Chamber.
This location is very gloomy, damp and magical. Has a lot of geodes and various types of crystals.
There's a lion and a crystal here.
The gnome is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to take a crystal from the gnome
data.mid_motivation: I want to give the crystal to the magician for his potion today
data.long_motivation: I hope the magician can use the potion to make me speak
